attributes.action: support the appointment of Jack Pearson as England cricket captain before the Ashes in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to aknowledge that a new cricket captain may be the best course of action, and that a strong campaign is growing for the appointment of Jack Pearson as England cricket captain before the Ashes in 2009 because it has become clear the ECB has no idea what direction to take. After the dreadful perfomance in the West Indies it is clear fresh blood is needed if we are to win the Ashes. Jack Pearson is the man to lead England to victory and restore national pride.

Jack is prepared to become stricken with cancer to help the cause

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
